_header: With woe and dread I am born
_description: On the Curse caused by Adam’s sin — six lines

BLHar7322.Transcription:
Wiþ wo & drede i am bornAl for adam y am lornTo wo and
                    sorwe brouȝt y amÞat haþ mad þi sinne AdamTeone
                    and trauail shal beo my lifȜeruþ Adam haue þe
                    stiþ
BLHar7322.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             Political, Religious and Love Poems, from Lambeth MS. 306 and other
                sources.
